synopsis.text: He avily invested in the world of anime and light novels, high school student Tomoya Aki dreams of creating a captivating visual novel game. His life takes an unexpected turn when he serendipitously encounters the enchanting Megumi Kato, who becomes the inspiration for his game's main heroine. To bring his vision to life, Tomoya assembles a diverse team of talented creators, including his half-foreigner childhood friend and art club ace, Eriri Spencer Sawamura, and the school's renowned literary genius, Utaha Kasumigaoka. However, Tomoya is in for a surprise when he discovers that Megumi, the girl he idolized, is actually his seemingly ordinary classmate. Despite this revelation, Tomoya remains steadfast in his mission to transform Megumi into the perfect virtual heroine while navigating the challenges and complexities of his newfound relationships. Little does he know that the emotions he aims to evoke in his game are deeply rooted in the personal experiences of his team members.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
